mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (image, content, at, userId, productId, orderid) VALUES (#{image}, #{content}, NOW(), #{user.id}, #{product.productId}, #{order.orderId})
mapper.select: SELECT r.review_id AS review_id, r.content AS review_content, r.at AS review_at, r.image AS review_image, u.id AS user_id, u.nickname AS user_nickname, p.product_id AS product_id, p.name AS product_name, p.image_data AS product_image_data FROM review r LEFT JOIN user u ON r.userId = u.id LEFT JOIN product p ON r.productId = p.product_id WHERE r.image IS NOT NULL -- 이미지가 있는 리뷰만 선택 ORDER BY r.review_id DESC LIMIT #{size}
